name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 戏词拼台词丨视频截图拼图插件
name.en: XiCi SceneCaption Stitcher | Video Screenshot & Caption Stitch Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 戏词拼台词插件是一款运行在浏览器上的视频截图工具，可以通过简单的点击轻松完成视频截图，并生成台词拼图。
short.en: XiCi SceneCaption Stitcher: Easily capture video screenshots and create caption stitches with a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
📷 一键截图
点击视频播放器中的戏词截图按钮，快速捕捉精彩画面至操作面板。

🧩 一键拼图
轻松调整截图顺序和样式，瞬间生成台词拼图。

✨ 一键存图
保存并分享您的台词拼图，轻松分享到社交媒体，与朋友一同回味精彩瞬间！
long.en:
📷 One-click Screenshot
Click the Capture screenshot button in the video player to quickly capture key moments to the control panel.

🧩 One-click Stitch
Easily adjust the order and style of your screenshots, and instantly create a caption stitch.

✨ One-click Save
Save and share your caption stitch on social media, and relive the best moments with friends!
